{{{
ImpossiblePrefix := (Mr|Ms|U.S|[A-Z]|etc)
PossibleStop := (!|"|\. etc)
ImpossibleStart := (braces|posible) | PossibleStop
Token := (\B\W+\B|\b\w+\b)

//actual pattern for Stop chunk
Rule1 := (?not[ImpossiblePrefix] Token) (=Stop PossibleStop) (?not[ImpossibleStart]) 

Rule2 := START cut[(Token+? (STOP|END))]* END



}}}
